name: ev-server
description: Backend for Electric Vehicle charging station
author: Serge FABIANO <sergefabiano@@free.fr>

scripts.git:sdiff: git diff && git submodule foreach 'git diff'
scripts.start:dev: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development-build node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:debug: npm version && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --inspect --files --max-old-space-size=4096 -- src/start.ts
scripts.start:dev:prof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development node -r source-map-support/register --prof -- dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:doctorprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic doctor -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:flameprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic flame -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:dev:bubbleprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=development clinic bubbleprof -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:prof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production node -r source-map-support/register --prof dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:doctorprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic doctor -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:flameprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic flame -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.start:prod:bubbleprof: npm version && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NODE_ENV=production clinic bubbleprof -- node -r source-map-support/register dist/start.js
scripts.clean-install: npm version && rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm cache clear --force && npm install
scripts.eslint: cross-env TIMING=1 eslint --ext .js,.ts types src test
scripts.eslint:fix: cross-env TIMING=1 eslint --ext .js,.ts --fix types src test
scripts.test:createContext: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/**/ContextBuilderRunner.ts
scripts.test:create:utbilling: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true TENANT_FILTER=utbilling jest --config='test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/**/ContextBuilderRunner.ts
scripts.test:asset: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/AssetTest.ts
scripts.test:authentication: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/AuthenticationTest.ts
scripts.test:billing: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/BillingTest.ts
scripts.test:car: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/CarTest.ts
scripts.test:company: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/Company*Test.ts
scripts.test:componentActivation: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/ComponentActivation*Test.ts
scripts.test:crypto: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/EncryptionSettingTest.ts
scripts.test:filter: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/FilterTest.ts
scripts.test:firmwareUpdateStatus: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/FirmwareUpdateStatusTest.ts
scripts.test:locking: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/LockingTest.ts
scripts.test:ocpi: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/OCPIServerTest.ts
scripts.test:ocpp: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/OCPP*Test.ts
scripts.test:oicp: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/OICP*Test.ts
scripts.test:registrationToken: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/RegistrationTokenTest.ts
scripts.test:security: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/SecurityTest.ts
scripts.test:setting: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/*SettingTest.ts
scripts.test:site: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent test/**/Site*Test.ts
scripts.test:smartCharging: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/SmartChargingTest.ts
scripts.test:stat: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/StatisticsTest.ts
scripts.test:tag: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/TagTest.ts
scripts.test:tenant: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/*TenantTest.ts
scripts.test:transaction: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent --forceExit -- test/**/TransactionTest.ts
scripts.test:template: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/UnitTestTemplate.ts
scripts.test:user: npm version && cross-env TS_NODE_FILES=true jest --config='./test/jest.config.ts' --runInBand --logHeapUsage --verbose --colors --silent -- test/**/UserTest.ts
